titleStmt.title: The dominion of the seed of God throughout all generations, or, The heighth and breadth and length and depth of the love of God which passeth knowledge in the sending of his Son Christ Jesus into the world, that whosoever believeth in Him should not perish but have life everlasting / by Geo. Bishope.
titleStmt.author: Bishop, George, d. 1668.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
